title: Episode 15: April Tomlin
description:
On today's episode, Kailey sits down with her friend and superstar interior designer, April Tomlin! April shares her latest design favorites and tips for decorating your home, as well as the story of her journey of faith.


Thank you to our sponsors! 

Grove: Get your free gift set worth up to $50 with your first order from Grove! https://bit.ly/CWKGrove   

Thistle Farms: Get the perfect Mother's Day gift at Thistle Farms & use the  code coffeewithkailey for 15% off at checkout.  https://bit.ly/CWKThistleFarms   

Trade Coffee: Right now, Trade is offering new subscribers a total of $30 off your  first order plus free shipping. That’s more than 40 cups of coffee for free! https://bit.ly/CWKTradeCoffee
